TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypedMessageConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 將具型別的訊息轉換為不具型別的訊息，或將不具型別的訊息轉換為具型別的訊息。

span.span: Converts a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供的功能可將具型別的訊息轉換為不具型別的訊息，或將不具型別的訊息轉換為具型別的訊息。This class provides functionalities to convert a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message. 具型別的訊息是已註解 屬性的型別的執行個體。A typed message is an instance of a type that has the attribute annotated. 不具型別的訊息是 類別的執行個體。An untyped message is one that is an instance of the class. 您可以使用 來註解型別，以建立自訂訊息型別，然後使用這個類別所提供的方法將它轉換為不具型別的 執行個體。You can annotate a type with the to create a custom message type, and then use the methods provided by this class to convert it to an untyped instance.

span.span: An untyped message.

summary.span: 從指定的 執行個體，建立具型別的訊息。

span.span: Creates a typed message from the specified instance.

returns.span: 屬於具型別的訊息的物件。

span.span: An object that is a typed message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會採用不具類型的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 訊息，也就是的執行個體，並將它轉換成具類型的訊息，也就是標註的型別執行個體。This method takes an untyped Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) message, that is, an instance of , and converts it into a typed message, that is, an instance of a type that is annotated by the .

summary.span: 根據指定的具型別的訊息，建立 執行個體。

span.span: Creates a instance from the specified typed message.

Public MustOverride Function ToMessage (typedMessage As Object) As Message

span.span: A typed message.

summary.span: 根據指定的具型別的訊息，建立 執行個體。

span.span: Creates a instance from the specified typed message.
A instance.

span.span: A typed message.

param.name: version
param.span: 指定與訊息關聯的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 的版本的 。

span.span: A that specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message.

summary.span: 使用指定的版本，從指定的具型別的訊息來建立 執行個體。

span.span: Creates a instance from the specified typed message using the specified version.
A instance.
